Having an updated report will also allow companies in Indiana & across the country to have a better understanding on how they can anticipate the needs of the federal government & provide the best quality product for American consumers.

Some of the nation’s largest vehicle fleets recycle used oil for re-refining & procure re-refined oil, including the Department of Defense, U.S. Postal Service, National Park Service, & state & local authorities.

Americans daily operate motor vehicles that rely on lubricated oil to run safely & efficiently. Our country is already re-refining lubricated oil through a process which rids the oil of harmful contaminants & restores the oil to its original effectiveness.

✅PASSES SENATE: I'm proud my #bipartisan re-refining bill is on its way to be signed into law. We need an up-to-date report from the DoE that'll allow Congress to better develop energy saving & environmentally conscious policy in connection w/how we use & reuse lubricating oil.

While our work is not done, this is an important step to make lasting changes to improve accountability & transparency in Congress.

I am pleased we have made much-needed improvements to the way Congress combats & responds to sexual harassment & retaliation in the House & Senate. Importantly, this bill guarantees taxpayer dollars will no longer be spent to settle sexual harassment or retaliation claims.

By passing the Congressional Accountability Act of 1995 Reform Act (#CAARA), Congress is working to ensure all employees have a safe workplace environment where allegations of wrongdoings are investigated in a swifter, fairer & more efficient manner.
